entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH THIS AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE MID 50S IN THE AFTERNOON
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING WEST WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
